pages.text: Rune stones are another important ingredient. they are needed for recipes and combined with $(item)Runes$() have strong magical effects. $(br2)They should be used first to craft an $(item)Altar$()!
The tricky part of the recipe is the $(item)Spirit Crystal$(), it can only be traded from a $(thing)Wandering Trader$() at this point or created via a found Altar.

pages.title: How to use Rune Stones
pages.text: With a right click you can place a $(item)Rune$() on a $(item)Rune Stone$() and thus activate various effects (like speed, regeneration or damage). $(br2)The effects occur on touch when the block is right-clicked or gets a redstone signal. $(br2)Shift + right click removes the $(item)Rune$() again.
